text: satyanisedhikal kuttankuttamayi narakattiyilekk nayikkappetum. annane avar atinatuttettiyal atinre kavatannal turakkappetum. atinre kavalkkar avareatinnane ceadikkum: "ninnalute nathanre vacanannal otikkelppiccu tarikayum i dinatte kantumuttentivarumenn munnariyippu nalkukayum ceyta, ninnalilninnutanneyulla daivadutanmar ninnalilekk vannettiyirunnille?" avar parayum: â€œate. pakse, satyanisedhikalkk siksavidhi sthirappettupeayi.â€
